page.title: 13A DAY IN A HOUSEWIFE LIFE
page.content: Rise at 7am.Make sandwiches for husband and childrens' lunch.Wake family,prepare breakfast of cereal, orange juice,tea and toast.Husband feeds 2 cats and 7 chickens and leaves for work at 8. Wash dishes and leave house at 8.30 to drive children to school.Park the car and go to the shops.I buy milk,bread,fruit and vegetables.9-30 home for coffee. Hang out washing,make beds,polish furniture,vacuum clean carpets.At 12 noon eat lunch of sandwiches,crisps and apple.Collect washing off line and iron it.Around 2-30 feet up and cup of tea.Collect children at 3.30,home to prepare evening meal. Husband home at 5-30,we all sit down to evening meal.Wash dishes.Give children help with homework and reading.Watch TV,children to bed at 9. Talk to husband,Cup of cocoa,bed at 10
